Description:
Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using Net.EXE
Check if the user that executed the commands is suspicious (e.g. service accounts, LOCAL_SYSTEM)


Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), omkar72, @svch0st, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Group And Account Reconnaissance Activity Using Net.EXE
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" ((process_path="*\\net.exe" OR process_path="*\\net1.exe") (original_file_name="net.exe" OR original_file_name="net1.exe")) ((((command="*domain admins*" OR command="* administrator*" OR command="* administrateur*" OR command="*enterprise admins*" OR command="*Exchange Trusted Subsystem*" OR command="*Remote Desktop Users*" OR command="*Utilisateurs du Bureau Ã  distance*" OR command="*Usuarios de escritorio remoto*" OR command="* /do*") (command="* group *" OR command="* localgroup *")) NOT command="* /add*") OR (command="* accounts *" command="* /do*"))
